GE07bhg4c08u:2: kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama /
GE07bhg4c08u:3: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate //1//

GE07bhg4c08u:7: pūrvādhyāyānte bhagavatopakṣiptānāṃ brahmādhyātmādi-saptānāṃ padarthānāṃ tattvaṃ jijñāsur arjuna uvāca kiṃ tad brahmeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c08u:9_0: madhusūdanaḥ - pūrvādhyāyānte te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam
GE07bhg4c08u:9_1: ity ādinā sārdha-ślokena sapta-padārthā jñeyatvena bhagavatā sūtritās teṣāṃ vṛtti-sthānīyo
GE07bhg4c08u:10: tatra sūtritāni sapta-vastūni viśeṣato bubhutsamānaḥ ślokābhyām /
GE07bhg4c08u:11: taj-jñeyatvenoktaṃ brahma kiṃ sopādhikaṃ nirupādhikaṃ vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:12: evam ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya tasminn adhiṣṭhāne tiṣṭhatīty adhyātmaṃ kiṃ śrotrādikaraṇa-grāmo vā pratyak-caitanyaṃ vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:13: tathā karma cākhilam ity atra kiṃ karma yajña-rūpam anyad vā vijñāntaṃ yajñaṃ tanute karmāṇi tanute 'pi ca iti śrutau dvaividhya-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:14: tava mama ca samatvāt kathaṃ tvaṃ māṃ pṛcchasīti śaṅkām apanudan sarva-puruṣebhya uttamasya sarvajñasya tava na kiṃcid ajñeyam iti saṃbodhanena sūcayati he puruṣottameti /
GE07bhg4c08u:15: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktaṃ pṛthivyādibhūtam adhikṛtya yat kiṃcit kāryam adhibhūta-padena vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ vā samastam eva kārya-jātam /
GE07bhg4c08u:17: adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate devatā-viṣayam anudhyānaṃ vā sarvadaivateṣv ādiyta-maṇḍalādiṣv anusyūtaṃ caitanyaṃ vā //1//
GE07bhg4c08u:20: śuddhāṃ ca bhaktiṃ provāca dve gatī api cāsṭame //
GE07bhg4c08u:22: atra teṣāṃ tattvaṃ jijñāsuḥ pṛcchati dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c08u:24: sa cāsmin dehe kathaṃ jñeya ity uttarasyānusaṅgī //1-2//
GE07bhg4c08u:26: utkān pṛṣṭaḥ kramād vyākhyad brahmādīn harir aṣṭame /
GE07bhg4c08u:27: yoga-miśrāṃ ca śuddhāṃ ca bhakti-mārga-dvayaṃ tathā //
GE07bhg4c08u:28: pūrvādhyāyānte mumukṣāṇāṃ jñeyatayoddiṣṭān brahmādīn saptārthān viboddhum arjunaḥ pṛcchati /
GE07bhg4c08u:29: kiṃ tad brahmeti kiṃ paramātma-caitanyaṃ vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:30: kiṃ jīvātma-caitanyaṃ vā tad brahmety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:31: kim adhyātmam iti ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtyeti nirukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:32: śrotrādīndriya-vṛndaṃ vā sūkṣma-bhūta-vṛndaṃ vā tad iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:33: āvayos taulyāt kim iti māṃ pṛcchasīti śaṅkāṃ nivartayituṃ sambodhanaṃ he puruṣottameti /
GE07bhg4c08u:34: pareśatvāt tava sarvaṃ suviditaṃ na tu memeti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:35: adhibhūtaṃ ca kim iti bhūtāny adhikṛtyeti nirukter ghaṭyādi-kāryaṃ vā sthūla-śarīraṃ vā tad iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:36: adhidaivaṃ kim iti devatā-viṣayakam anudhyānaṃ vā samaṣṭir virāṭ vā tad iti //1//
GE07bhg4c08u:42: atra dehe you yajño nivartate tasmin ko 'dhiyajño 'dhiṣṭhātā /
GE07bhg4c08u:43: prayojakaḥ phala-dātā ca ka ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:44: svarūpaṃ pṛṣṭvādhiṣṭhāna-prakāraṃ pṛcchati - kathaṃ kena prakāreṇāsāv asmin dehe sthito yajñam adhitiṣṭhantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:46: anta-kāle ca niyata-cittaiḥ puruṣaiḥ kathaṃ kenopāyena jñeyo 'si //2//
GE07bhg4c08u:47: madhusūdanaḥ - adhiyajño yajñam adhigato devatātmā vā para-brahma vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:48: sa ca kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa cintanīyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:50: sarvathāpi sa kim asmin dehe vartate tato bahir vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:51: dehe cet sa ko 'tra buddhyādis tad-vyatirikto vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:53: kintu saprakāra eka eva praśna iti draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c08u:54: parama-kāruṇikatvād āyāsenāpi sarvopadrava-nivārakasya bhagavato 'nāyāsena mat-sanehopadrava-nivāraṇam īṣatkaram ucitam eveti sūcayan sambodhayati he madhusūdaneti /
GE07bhg4c08u:55: prayāṇa-kāle ca sarva-karaṇa-grāma-vaiyāgryāc citta-samādhānānupapatteḥ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa niyatātmabhiḥ samāhita-cittairjñeyo 'sīty ukta-śaṅkā-sūcanārthaś cakāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:56: etat sarvaṃ sarvajñatvāt parama-kāruṇikatvāc ca śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ prati kathayety abhiprāyaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c08u:58: baladevaḥ - adhiyajñaḥ ka iti yajñam adhigata indrādir vā viṣṇur vā sa iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:59: katham iti tasyādhiyajña-bhāvaḥ katham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:60: etat sarvaṃ mat-sandeha-nivāraṇaṃ taveṣatkaram iti bodhayituṃ sambodhanaṃ - he madhusūdaneti /
GE07bhg4c08u:61: prayāṇeti tadā sarvendriya-vyagratayā citta-samādhānāsmabhavād iti bhāvaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c08u:67: śrīdharaḥ - praśna-krameṇaivottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca akṣaram iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:70: paramaṃ yad akṣaraṃ jagato mūla-kāraṇaṃ tad braham /
GE07bhg4c08u:71: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantīti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:72: svasyaiva brahmaṇa evāṃśatayā jīva-rūpeṇa bhavanaṃ svabhāvaḥ /

GE07bhg4c08u:77: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajā //
GE07bhg4c08u:79: tau bhūta-bhāvodbhavau karoti yo visargo devatoddeśena dravya-tyāga-rūpo yajñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:80: sarva-karmaṇām upalakṣaṇam etat sa ca karma-śabda-vācyaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c08u:81: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ saptānāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaraṃ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:82: praśna-krameṇa hi nirṇaye praṣṭur abhīṣṭa-siddhir anāyāsena syādity abhiprāyavān bhagavān atra śloke praśna-trayaṃ krameṇa nirdhāritavān /
GE07bhg4c08u:83: evaṃ dvitīya-śloke 'pi praśna-trayaṃ tṛtīya-śloke tv ekam iti vibhāgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:84: nirupādhikam eva brahmātra vivakṣitaṃ brahma-śabdena na tu sopādhikam iti prathama-praśnasyottaram āha - akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīty avināśi aśnute vā sarvam iti sarva-vyāpakam /
GE07bhg4c08u:85_0: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇu ity ādy upakramya
GE07bhg4c08u:85_1: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryā-candramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ nānyad ato
GE07bhg4c08u:85_2: 'sti draṣṭṛ śrutir ityādi madhye parāmṛśya etasmin tu khalv akṣarae gārgy ākāśa otaś
GE07bhg4c08u:85_3: ca protaś ca ity upasaṃhṛtaṃ śrutyā /

GE07bhg4c08u:91: paramaṃ sva-prakāśa-paramānanda-rūpaṃ praśāsanasya kṛtsna-jaḍa-varga-dhāraṇasya ca liṅgasya tatraivopapatteḥ /

GE07bhg4c08u:93_1: rūḍhir yogam apaharati iti nyāyena rathakāra-śabdena jāti-viśeṣavat-praṇavākhyam
GE07bhg4c08u:94: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahmeti ca pareṇa viśeṣaṇāt ānaarthakya-pratihatānāṃ viparītaṃ balābalam iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:95: varṣāsu rathakāra ādadhīta ity atra tu jāti-viśeṣe nāsty asambhava iti viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:96: ananyathā-siddhena tu liṅgena śruter bādhaḥ ākāśas tal-liṅgāt ity ādau vivṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:98: ananyathā-siddhena liṅgena śruter bādhe yatra yogaḥ sambhavati tatra sa eva gṛhyate mukhyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:99: yathājyaiḥ stuvate pṛṣṭaiḥ stuvata ity ādau /
GE07bhg4c08u:101: yatra tu yogo 'pi na sambhavati tatra gauṇī vṛttir yathākāśa-prāṇādi-śabdeṣu /
GE07bhg4c08u:103: brahmaṇi ā samantāt kāśata iti yogaḥ sambhavatīti cet /
GE07bhg4c08u:105: tathā ca parāmarṣaṃ sūtraṃ prasiddheś ca (Vs 1.3.17) iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:107: tad evaṃ kiṃ tad brahmeti nirṇītam /
GE07bhg4c08u:109: yad akṣaraṃ brahmety uktaṃ tasyaiva svabhāvaḥ svo bhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ pratyak-caitanyaṃ na tu svasya bhāva iti ṣaṣṭhī-samāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:112: tasmān na brahmaṇaḥ saṃbandhi kintu brahma-svarūpam eva /
GE07bhg4c08u:113: ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya bhoktṛtayā vartamānam adhyātmam ucyate 'dhyātma-śabdenābhidhīyate na karaṇa-grāma ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:114_0: yāga-dāna-homātmakaṃ vaidikaṃ karmaivātra karma-śabdena vivikṣitam iti tṛtīya-praśnottaram
GE07bhg4c08u:114_1: āha bhūtānāṃ bhavana-dharmakāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sthāvara-jaṅgamānāṃ bhāvam utpattim udbhavaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:114_2: vṛddhiṃ ca karoti yo visargas tyāgasta-tac-chāstra-vihito yāga-dāna-homātmakaḥ sa

GE07bhg4c08u:123: te vā ete āhutī hute utkrāmataḥ ity ādi śruteś ca //3//
GE07bhg4c08u:125: na kṣaratīti akṣaraṃ nityaṃ yat paramaṃ tad brahma-- etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantīti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:126: svabhāvaḥ svātmānaṃ dehādhyāsa-vaśād bhāvayati janayatīti svabhāvaḥ jīvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:127: yad vā svaṃ bhāvayati paramātmānaṃ prāpayatīti svabhāvaḥ śuddha-jīvo 'dhyātmam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:129: bhūtair eva bhāvānāṃ manuṣyādi-dehānām udbhavaṃ karotīti sa visargo jīvasya saṃsāraḥ karma-janyatvāt karma-saṃjñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:130: karma-śabdena jīvasya saṃsāra ucyata ity arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c08u:131: baladevaḥ - evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān krameṇa saptānām uttaram āha akṣaram iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:132: na kṣaratīti nirkter akṣaraṃ yat paramaṃ dehādi-viviktaṃ jīvātma-caitanyaṃ tan mayā brahmety ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:133: tasyākṣara-śabdatvaṃ brahma-śabdatvaṃ ca-avyaktam akṣare līyate 'kṣaraṃ tamasi līyate tama ekībhavati parasminn iti vijñānaṃ brahma ced veda iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:135: svasya jīvātmanaḥ sambandhī yo bhāvo bhūta-sūkṣma-tad-vāsanā-lakṣaṇa-padārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:136: pañcāgni-vidyāyāṃ paṭhitas tad-ātmani saṃbadhyamānatvān mayādhyātmam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:137: bhūteti teṣāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ sthūlais taiḥ saṃpṛktānāṃ bhāvo manuṣyādi-lakṣaṇas tad-udbhava-karas tad-utpādako yo visargaḥ sa karma saṃjñitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:138_1: yaḥ karma-śeṣo bhuvi manuṣyādi-deha-lābhāya visṛṣṭas tan mayā karmocyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:139: chāndogye dyu-parjanya-pṛthivī-puruṣa-yoṣitsu pañcasv agniṣu śraddhā-soma-vṛṣṭy-anna-retāṃsi kramāt pañcāhutayaḥ paṭhyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:140: tatrāyam arthaḥ - vaidiko jīva iha loke 'smayāni dadhy-ādīni śraddhayā juhoti /
GE07bhg4c08u:141: tā dadhy-ādimayyaḥ pañcīkṛtatvāt pañca-bhūta-rūpā āpaḥ śraddhayā hutatvāt śraddhākhyāhuti-svarūpeṇa tasmin jīve saṃbaddhās tiṣṭhanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:145: hutāstāḥ soma-rājākhya-divya-dehatayā pariṇamante tena dehena sa tatra karma-phalāni bhuṅkte /
GE07bhg4c08u:146: tad-bhogāvasāne 'smayo jīvavān dehais tair devaiḥ parjanyāgnau huto vṛṣṭir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c08u:147: vṛṣṭi-bhūtās tāḥ sajīvāḥ pṛthivy-agnau tair hutā brīhy-ādy-anna-bhāvaṃ labhante /
GE07bhg4c08u:148: anna-bhūtāḥ sajīvās tāḥ puruṣāgnau hutā reto-bhāvaṃ bhajante /
GE07bhg4c08u:149: reto-bhūtāḥ sa-jīvās tā yoṣid-agnau tair hutā garbhātmanā sthitā manuṣya-bhāvaṃ prayāntīti tad-bhāva-hetur anuśaya-śabda-vācyaḥ karma-śeṣaḥ karmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:150: evam evoktaṃ sūtrakṛtā tad-antara-pratipattau ity ādibhiḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c08u:157: bhūtaṃ prāṇi-mātram adhikṛtya bhavatīty adhibhūtam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:158: puruṣo vairājaḥ sūrya-maṇḍala-madhyavartī svāṃśa-bhūta-sarva-devatānām adhipatir adhidaivatam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:160: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:161: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata // iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:162: atrāsmin dehe 'ntaryāmitvena sthito 'ham evādhiyajño yajñādi-karma-pravartakas tat-phala-dātā ca /
GE07bhg4c08u:163: katham ity asyāpy uttaram anenaivoktaṃ bhraṣṭavyam /

GE07bhg4c08u:171: madhusūdanaḥ - sampraty agrima-praśna-trayasyottaram āha adhibhūtam iti /

GE07bhg4c08u:173_0: puruṣo hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samaṣṭi-liṅgātmā vyaṣṭi-sarva-karaṇānugrāhakaḥ ātmaivedam agra

GE07bhg4c08u:174: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /

GE07bhg4c08u:179: sarva-yajñābhimāninī viṣṇv-ākhyā devatā yajño vai viṣṇuḥ iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:180: sa ca viṣṇur adhiyajño 'haṃ vāsudeva eva na mad-bhinnaḥ kaścit /

GE07bhg4c08u:182: sa cātrāsmin manuṣya-dehe yajña-rūpeṇa vartate buddhyādi-vyatirikto viṣṇu-rūpatvāt /

GE07bhg4c08u:195: puruṣaḥ samaṣṭi-virāṭ sa mayādhidaivam ity ucyate adhikṛtya vartamānāny ādityādīni daivatāny atreti vyutpatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:196: atra dehe 'dhiyajño yajñam adhikṛtya vartata iti vyutpattes tat-pravartakas tat-phala-pradaś cāham eva /
GE07bhg4c08u:199: anena katham ity asyāpy uttaram uktaṃ prādeśa-mātra-vapustvenāntar-niyamayann ahaṃ yajñādi-pravartaka ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:200: tathā ca mad-arcā-sevanād etān brahmādīn saptārthān svarūpato ' śrameṇa vindatīti /
GE07bhg4c08u:204: anta-kāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram /
GE07bhg4c08u:205: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c08u:206: śrīdharaḥ - prayāṇa-kāle ca jñāyo 'sīty anena pṛṣṭam anta-kāle jñānopāyaṃ tat-phalaṃ ca darśayati anta-kāla iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:207: mām evokta-lakṣaṇam antaryāmi-rūpaṃ parameśvaraṃ smaran dehaṃ tyaktvā yaḥ prakarṣeṇārcir-ādi-mārgeṇottarāyaṇa-pathā yāti sa mad-bhāvaṃ mad-rūpatāṃ yāti /
GE07bhg4c08u:211: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ prayāṇa-kāle ca kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīti saptamasya praśnasyottaram āha anta-kāle ceti /
GE07bhg4c08u:212_0: mām eva bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam adhiyajñaṃ sa-guṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ vā paramam akṣaraṃ brahma
GE07bhg4c08u:212_1: na tv adhyātmādikaṃ smaran sadā cintayaṃs tat-saṃskāra-pāṭavāt samasta-karaṇa-grāma-vaiyagryavaty
GE07bhg4c08u:212_2: anta-kāle 'pi smaran kalevaraṃ muktvā śarīre 'haṃ-mamābhimānaṃ tyaktvā prāṇa-viyoga-kāle
GE07bhg4c08u:212_3: yaḥ prayāti sa-guṇa-dhyāna-pakṣe 'gnijyotir-ahaḥ-śukla ity ādi-vacyamāṇena deva-yāna-mārgeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:212_4: pitṛ-yāna-mārgāt prakarṣeṇa yāti sa upāsako mad-bhāvaṃ mad-rūpatāṃ nirguṇa-brahma-bhāvaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:213: nirguṇa-brahma-smaraṇa-pakṣe tu kalevaraṃ tyaktvā prayātīti loka-dṛṣṭy-abhiprāyaṃ na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanty atraiva samavanīyante iti śrutes
GE07bhg4c08u:215: sa mad-bhāvaṃ sākṣād eva yāti brahmaiva san brahmāpy eti (BAU 4.4.6) iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:216: nāsty atra deha-vyatirikta ātmani mad-bhāva-prāptau vā saṃśayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:218: deha-vyatireke 'pi īśvarād bhinno na veti sandeho na vidyate chidyante sarva-saṃśayāḥ (MuṇḍU 2.2.8) iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:219: atra ca kalevaraṃ muktvā prayātīti dehād bhinnatvaṃ mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti ceśvarād abhinnatvaṃ jīvasyoktam iti draṣṭavyam //5//
GE07bhg4c08u:220: viśvanāthaḥ --- prayāṇa-kāle kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīty asyottaram āha-anta-kāle ceti /
GE07bhg4c08u:221: mām eva smarann iti mat-smaraṇam eva maj-jñānam /
GE07bhg4c08u:222: na tu ghaṭa-paṭādir ivāhaṃ kenāpi tattvato jñātuṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:224: baladevaḥ -- prayāṇa-kāle kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīty asyottaram āha-anteti /
GE07bhg4c08u:225: atra smaraṇātmakena jñānena jñeyo bhavan-mad-bhāvopalambhanaṃ ca tat phalaṃ prayacchāmīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:230: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram /
GE07bhg4c08u:231: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c08u:232: śrīdharaḥ - na kevalaṃ māṃ smaran mad-bhāvaṃ prāpnotīti niyamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:234: yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaṃ devatāntaraṃ vānyam api vānta-kāle smaran dehaṃ tyajati taṃ tam eva smaryamāṇaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c08u:236: sadā tad-bhāva-bhāvita iti sarvadā tasya bhāvo bhāvanā anucintanam /
GE07bhg4c08u:238_0: madhusūdanaḥ - anta-kāle bhagavantam anudhyāyato bhagavat-prāptir niyateti vaditum
GE07bhg4c08u:238_1: anyad api yatkiṃcid api yat kiṃcit tat-kāle dhyāyato dehaṃ tyajatas tat-prāptir avaśyambhāvinīti
GE07bhg4c08u:239_0: na kevalaṃ māṃ smaran mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti niyamaḥ kiṃ tarhi yaṃ yaṃ cāpi bhāvaṃ devatā-viśeṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:239_1: ca-kārād anyad api yat kiṃcid vā smaraṃś cintayann ante prāṇa-viyoga-kāle kalevaraṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:239_2: tyajati sa taṃ tam eva smaryamāṇaṃ bhāvam eva nānyam eti prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c08u:241: tena cāvaśyānugrāhyatvaṃ tena ca pratāraṇāśaṅkā-śūnyatvam iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:242_0: anta-kāle smaraṇodyamāsambhave 'pi pūrvābhyāsa-janitā vāsanaiva smṛti-hetur ity āha
GE07bhg4c08u:242_1: - sadā sarvadā tasmin devatā-viśeṣādau bhāvo bhāvanā vāsanā tad-bhāvaḥ sa bhāvitaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:242_2: sampādito yena sa tathā bhāvita-tad-bhāva ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:244: tad-bhāvena tac-cintanena bhāvito vāsita-citta iti vā //6//
GE07bhg4c08u:245: viśvanāthaḥ --- mām eva smaran māṃ prāpnotītivan mad-anyam api smaran mad-anyam eva prāpnotīty āha yaṃ yam iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:246: tasya bhāvena bhāvanenānucintanena bhāvito vāsitas tan-mayī-bhūtaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c08u:247: baladevaḥ - na ca mat-smarteiva mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti niyamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:248: kintv anya-smartāpy anya-bhāvaṃ yātīty āha yaṃ yam iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:251: yathā bharato dehānte mṛgaṃ cintayan mṛgo 'bhūt /
GE07bhg4c08u:252: antima-smṛtiś ca pūrva-smṛti-viṣayaiva bhavatīty āha sadeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:256: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca /
GE07bhg4c08u:259: na tu tadā vivaśasya smaraṇodyamo sambhavati tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:261: satataṃ smaraṇaṃ ca citta-śuddhiṃ vinā na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c08u:264: evaṃ mayy arpitaṃ manaḥ saṅkalpātmakaṃ buddhiś ca vyavasāyātmikāyena tvayā sa tvaṃ māme va prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c08u:266: madhusūdanaḥ - yasmād evaṃ pūrva-smaraṇābhyāsa-janitāntyā bhāvanaiva tadānīṃ paravaśasya dehāntara-prāptau kāraṇaṃ tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:267: tasmān mad-viṣayakāntya-bhāvanotpatty-arthaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu pūrvam evādareṇa māṃ saguṇam īśvaram anusmara cintaya /
GE07bhg4c08u:268: yady antaḥkaraṇāśuddhi-vaśān na śaknoṣi satatam anusmartuṃ tato 'ntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhaye yudhya ca /
GE07bhg4c08u:271_1: saṅkalpādhyavasāya-lakṣaṇe mano-buddhī yena tvayā sa tvam īdṛśaḥ sarvadā mac-cintana-paraḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:273: idaṃ ca saguṇa-brahma-cintanam upāsakānām uktaṃ teṣām antya-bhāvanā-sāpekṣatvāt
GE07bhg4c08u:274: / nirguṇa-brahma-jñānināṃ tu jñāna-sama-kālam evājñāna-nivṛtti-lakṣaṇāyā mukteḥ siddhatvān nāsty antya-bhāvanāpekṣeti draṣṭavyam //7//
GE07bhg4c08u:277: baladevaḥ - yasmāt pūrva-smṛtir evāntima-smṛti-hetus tasmāt tvaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu pratikṣaṇaṃ mām anusmara yudhyasva ca loka-saṅgrahāya yuddhādīni svocitāni karmāṇi kuru /
GE07bhg4c08u:278: evaṃ mayy arpitamanobuddhis tvaṃ mām evaiṣyasi,
GE07bhg4c08u:279: na tv anyad iy atra sandehas te mābhūt //7//
GE07bhg4c08u:284: śrīdharaḥ - santata-smaraṇasya cābhyāso 'ntaraṅga-sādhanam iti darśayann āha abhyāsa-yogeneti /
GE07bhg4c08u:288: ataeva nānyaṃ viṣayaṃ gantuṃ śīlaṃ yasya /
GE07bhg4c08u:290: divyaṃ dyotanātmakaṃ paramaṃ puruṣaṃ parameśvaram anucintayan he pārtha tam eva yātīti //8//
GE07bhg4c08u:291: madhusūdanaḥ - tad evaṃ saptānām api praśnānām uttaram uktvā prayāṇa-kāle bhagavad-anusmaraṇasya bhagavat-prāpti-lakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ vivarītum ārabhate abhyāseti /
GE07bhg4c08u:292: abhyāsaḥ sajātīya-pratyaya-pravāho mayi vijātīya-pratyayānantaritaḥ ṣaṣṭhe prāg vyākhyātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:293_0: sa eva yogaḥ samādhis tena yuktaṃ tatraiva vyāpṛtam ātmākāra-vṛtti-śūnyaṃ yac cetas
GE07bhg4c08u:293_1: tena cetasābhyāsa-pāṭavena nānya-gāminā nānyatra viṣayāntare nirodha-prayatnaṃ vināpi
GE07bhg4c08u:293_2: gantuṃ śīlam asyeti tena paramaṃ niratiśayaṃ puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ divyaṃ divi dyotanātmany
GE07bhg4c08u:293_3: āditye bhavaṃ yaś cāsāv āditye iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:297: viśvanāthaḥ --- tasmāt smaraṇābhyāsina evānta-kāle svata eva mat-smaraṇaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c08u:298: tena ca māṃ prāpnotīty ataś cetaso mat-smaraṇam eva paramo yoga ity āha abhyāsa-yoga iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:299: abhyāso mat-smaraṇasya punaḥ punar āvṛttir eva yogas tad-yuktena cetasā,
GE07bhg4c08u:300: ataeva nānyaṃ viṣayaṃ gantuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tena /
GE07bhg4c08u:302: baladevaḥ - sārvadikī smṛtir evāntima-smṛtikarīty evaṃ draḍhayati abhyāsenti /
GE07bhg4c08u:304: tato 'nyatrācalatā tad ekāgreṇa cetasā divyaṃ puruṣaṃ paramaṃ sa-śrīkaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ vāsudevam anucintayan tam eva kīṭa-bhṛṅga-nyāyena tat-tulāḥ san yāti labhate //8//
GE07bhg4c08u:311: śrīdharaḥ - punar apy anucintanīyaṃ puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi kavim iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c08u:314: aṇoḥ sūkṣmād apy aṇīyāṃsaṃ atisūkṣmam ākāśa-kāla-digbhyo 'py atisūkṣmataram /
GE07bhg4c08u:317: vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt iti śruteḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c08u:318: madhusūdanaḥ - punar api tam evānucintayitavyaṃ gantavyaṃ ca puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi kavim iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:320: purāṇaṃ cirantanaṃ sarva-kāraṇatvād anādim iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c08u:322: aṇor aṇīyāṃsaṃ sūkṣād apy ākāśādeḥ sūkṣmataraṃ tad-upādānatvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:323: sarvasya karma-phala-jātasya dhātāraṃ vicitratayā prāṇibhyo vibhaktāraṃ phalam ata upapatteḥ iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:324: na cintayituṃ śakyam aparimitam ahimatvena rūpaṃ yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c08u:325: ādityasyeva sakala-jagad-avabhāsako varṇaḥ prakāśo yasya taṃ sarvasya jagato 'vabhāsakam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c08u:326: ataeva tamasaḥ parastāt tamaso mohāndhakārād ajñāna-lakṣaṇāt parastāt prakāśa-rūpatvena tamo-virodhinam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c08u:327: anusmarec cintayed yaḥ kaścid api sa taṃ yātīti pūrveṇaiva
GE07bhg4c08u:329: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam iti pareṇa vā sambandhaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c08u:330: viśvanāthaḥ --- yogābhyāsaṃ vinā manaso viṣaya-grāmān nivṛttir durghaṭā /
GE07bhg4c08u:331: yac ca vinā sātatyena bhagavat-smaraṇam api durghaṭam iti yuktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:332: kenacit yogābhyāsena sahitaiva bhaktiḥ kriyata iti tāṃ yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim āha kavim iti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:333: kaviṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvajño 'py anyaḥ sanakādiḥ sārvakāliko na bhavaty ata āha purāṇam anādiṃ sarvajño 'nādir apy antaryāmī sa bhakty-upadeṣṭā na bhavaty ata āha anuśāsitāram /
GE07bhg4c08u:335: tādṛśa-kṛpālur api sudurvijñeya-tattva eva ity āha aṇoḥ sakāśād apy aṇīyāṃsam /
GE07bhg4c08u:336: tarhi sa kiṃ jīva iva paramāṇu-pramāṇas tatrāha sarvasya dhātāraṃ sarva-vastu-mātra-dhārakatvena sarva-vyāpakatvāt paraṃ mahā-parimāṇam apīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:339: madhyama-parimāṇam api tasyānanya-prakāśyatvam āha āditya-varṇam ādityavat sva-para-prakāśako varṇaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya /
GE07bhg4c08u:340: tathā tamasaḥ prakṛteḥ parastāt vartamānaṃ māyā-śaktimantam api māyātīta-svarūpam ity arthaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c08u:341: baladevaḥ - yogād ṛte cetaso 'nanya-gāmitā duṣkareti yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim āha kavim ity ādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:344: aṇor aṇīyāṃsaṃ tena cāṇum api jīvam antaḥ praviśatīti siddham /
GE07bhg4c08u:345: āha caivaṃ śrutiḥ antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:348: nanu katham evaṃ saṅgacchate tatrāha acintya-rūpaṃ avitarkya-svarūpaṃ ekam eva brahma puruṣa-vidhatvena madhyama-parimāṇam aṇor aṇīyāṃsam ity ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:352: sva-parakāśatām āha ādityeti sūryavat sva-para-prakāśakam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:356: etādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'nukṣaṇaṃ smaret sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti iti pareṇānvayaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c08u:362: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam //10//
GE07bhg4c08u:365: evaṃbhūtaṃ puruṣam anta-kāle bhakti-yukto niścalena vikṣepa-rahitena manasā yo 'nusmaret /
GE07bhg4c08u:367: yoga-balena samyak suṣumṇā mārgeṇa bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśyeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:368: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣaṃ paramātma-svarūpaṃ divyaṃ dyotanātmakaṃ prāpnoti //10//
GE07bhg4c08u:369: madhusūdanaḥ - kadā tad-anusmaraṇe pratrātireko 'bhyavartate tad āha prayāneti /
GE07bhg4c08u:370: prayāṇa-kāle 'nta-kāle 'calenaikāgreṇa manasā taṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'nusmared ity anuvartate /
GE07bhg4c08u:371: kīdṛśaḥ bhaktyā parameśvara-viṣayeṇa parameṇa premṇā yuktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:372: yogasya samādher balena taj-janita-saṃskāra-samūhena vyutthāna-saṃskāra-virodhinā ca yuktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:373_0: evaṃ prathamaṃ hṛdaya-puṇḍarīke vaśīkṛtya tata ūrdhva-gāminyā suṣumṇayā nāḍyā gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:373_1: bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa bhruvor madhye ājñā-cakre prāṇam āveśya sthāpayitvā samyag apramatto
GE07bhg4c08u:373_2: brahma-randhrād utkrāmya sa evam upāsakas taṃ kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram ity-ādi-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:373_3: paraṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ dyotanātmakam upaiti pratipadyate //10 //
GE07bhg4c08u:374: viśvanāthaḥ --- prayāṇa-kāle 'nta-kāle 'calena niścalena manasā yā satata-smaraṇa-mayī bhaktis tayā yuktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:378: baladevaḥ -- yo jano bhaktyā paramātma-premṇā yoga-balena samādhi-janita-saṃskāra-nicayena ca yuktaḥ prayāṇa-kāle maraṇa-samaye 'calenaikāgreṇa manasā taṃ puruṣam anusmaret /
GE07bhg4c08u:380: bhruvor madhye ājñā-cakre prāṇam āveśya saṃsthāpya samyak sāvadhānaḥ san sa taṃ puruṣam upaiti //10//
GE07bhg4c08u:387: śrīdharaḥ - kevalād abhyāsa-yogād api praṇavā̆bhyāsam antaraṅgaṃ vidhitsuḥ pratijānīte-yad akṣaram iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:389: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhata iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:392: yac ca jñātum icchanto gurukule brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
GE07bhg4c08u:393: tat te tubhyaṃ padaṃ padyate gamyata iti padaṃ prāpyam /
GE07bhg4c08u:396: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ yena kenacid abhidhānena dhyāna-kāle bhagavad-anusmaraṇe prāpte-
GE07bhg4c08u:400: tatte padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmy om ity etat // (KaṭhaU 1.2.15)
GE07bhg4c08u:401: ity ādi-śruti-pratipāditatvena praṇavenaivābhidhānena tad-anusmaraṇaṃ kartavyaṃ nānyena mantrādineti niyantum upakramate yad akṣaram iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:402_0: yad akṣaram avināśi oṅkārākhyaṃ brahma veda-vido vadanti etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi
GE07bhg4c08u:402_1: brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam aṇv ahrasvam adīrgham ity ādi-vacanaiḥ sarva-viśeṣa-nivartanena pratipādayanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:403_0: pramāṇa-kuśalair eva pratipannaṃ kiṃ tu muktopasṛpyatayā tair apy anubhūtam ity āha-viśanti
GE07bhg4c08u:403_1: svarūpatayā samyag-darśanena yad akṣaraṃ yatayo yatna-śīlāḥ saṃnyāsino vīta-rāgā niḥspṛhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:404_0: na kevalaṃ siddhair anubhūtaṃ sādhakānām api sarvo 'pi prayāsas tad-artha ity āha
GE07bhg4c08u:404_1: yad-icchanto jñātuṃ naiṣṭhikā brahmacāriṇo brahmacaryaṃ gurukula-vāsādi-tapaś caranti
GE07bhg4c08u:404_2: yāvaj-jīvaṃ tad akṣarākhyaṃ padaṃ padanīyaṃ te tubhyaṃ saṅgraheṇa saṅkṣepeṇāhaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:405: pravakṣye prakarṣeṇa kathayiṣyāmi yathā tava bodho bhavati tathā /
GE07bhg4c08u:406: atas tad akṣaraṃ kathaṃ mayā jñeyam ity ākulo mā bhūr ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:407_0: atra ca parasya brahmaṇo vācaka-rūpeṇa pratimāvat-pratīka-rūpeṇa ca yaḥ punar etaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:407_1: trimātreṇom ity aneaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣam abhidhyāyīta sa tam adhigacchati ity
GE07bhg4c08u:407_2: ādi-vacanair manda-madhyama-buddhīnāṃ krama-mukti-phalakam upāsanam uktaṃ tad evehāpi
GE07bhg4c08u:408: ato yoga-dhāraṇā-sahitam oṅkāropāsanaṃ tat phalaṃ sva-svarūpaṃ tato 'punar-āvṛttis tan-mārgaś cety artha-jātam ucyate yāvad adhyāya-samāpti //11//
GE07bhg4c08u:409: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya ity etāvan mātroktyā yogo na jñāyate,
GE07bhg4c08u:413: kiṃ vā prāpyam ity api saṅkṣepeṇa brūhīty apekṣāyām āha yad iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:414: yad evākṣaram om ity ekākṣara-vācyaṃ brahma yatayo viśanti tat padaṃ padyate gamyata iti padaṃ prāpyam /
GE07bhg4c08u:415: samyaktayā gṛhayte 'neneti saṅgrahas tad-upāyas tena saha pravakṣye śṛṇu //11//
GE07bhg4c08u:416: baladevaḥ -- nanu bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśyaitāvatā yogo nāvagamyate,
GE07bhg4c08u:417: tasmāt tasya prakāraṃ tatra japyaṃ prāpyaṃ brūhīty apekṣāyām āha yad akṣaram iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:418: ekam eva brahma akṣaram om iti vācakaṃ vadanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:419: vīta-rāgā vinaṣṭāvidyā yatayo yad brahma tad-vācya-bhūtaṃ vijñānaika-rasaṃ viśanti prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:420: tad-ubhaya-r”paṃ brahma jñātum icchanto naiṣṭhikā gurukula-vasādi-lakṣaṇaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
GE07bhg4c08u:421: tat padaṃ prāpyaṃ saṅgraheṇopāyena saha pravakṣye vakṣyāmi yathānāyasena tvaṃ tad-vidyāṃ prāpnuyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:422: samyag gṛhyate tattvam anena iti nirukteḥ saṅgraha upāyaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c08u:425: sarva-dvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca /
GE07bhg4c08u:427: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran /
GE07bhg4c08u:428: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim //13//
GE07bhg4c08u:429: śrīdharaḥ - pratijñātam upāyaṃ sāṅgam āha dvābhyāṃ sarveti /
GE07bhg4c08u:434: mūrdhni bhruvor madhye prāṇam ādhāya yogasya dhāraṇāṃ sthairyam āsthitaḥ āśritavān san //12//
GE07bhg4c08u:435: om iti / om ity ekaṃ yad akṣaraṃ tad eva brahma-vācakatvād vā pratimādivad brahma-pratīkatvād vā brahma /
GE07bhg4c08u:436: tad-vyāharan uccārayaṃs tad-vācyaṃ ca mām anusmarann eva dehaṃ tyajan yaḥ prakarṣeṇa yāti arcirādi-mārgeṇa sa paramāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ gatiṃ mad-gatiṃ yāti prāpnoti //13//
GE07bhg4c08u:437: madhusūdanaḥ - tatra pravakṣya iti pratijñātam arthaṃ sopakaraṇam āhaa dvābhyām sarva-dvārāṇīti /
GE07bhg4c08u:438: sarvāṇīndriya-dvārāṇi saṃyamya sva-sva-viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya viṣaya-doṣa-darśanābhyāsāt tad-vimukhatām āpāditaiḥ śrotrādibhiḥ śabdādi-viṣaya-grahaṇam akurvan /
GE07bhg4c08u:439: bāheyndriya-nirodhe 'pi manasaḥ pracāraḥ syād ity ata āha mano hṛdi nirudhya ca,
GE07bhg4c08u:440: abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭhe vyākhyātābhyāṃ hṛdaya-deśe mano nirudhya nirvṛttikatām āpādya ca,
GE07bhg4c08u:441: antar api viṣaya-cintām akurvann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:442_0: evaṃ bahir antar upalabdhi-dvārāṇi sarvāṇi saṃnirudhya kriyā-dvāraṃ prāṇam api sarvato
GE07bhg4c08u:442_1: nigṛhya bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa mūrdhny ādhāya bhruvor madhye tad-upari ca gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇāveśyātmano
GE07bhg4c08u:444: om ity ekam akṣaraṃ brahma-vācakatvāt pratimā-baddha-brahma-pratīkatvād vā brahma vyāharann uccaran /
GE07bhg4c08u:445: om iti vyāharann ity etāvataiva nirvāha ekākṣaram ity anāyāsa-kathanena stuty-artham /
GE07bhg4c08u:446: om iti vyāharann ekākṣaram ekam advitīyam akṣaram avināśi sarva-vyāpakaṃ brahma mām om ity asyārthaṃ smarann iti vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:447_0: tena praṇavaṃ japaṃs tad-abhidheya-bhūtaṃ ca māṃ cintayan mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā dehaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:447_1: tyajanyaḥ prayāti sa yāti deva-yāna-mārgeṇa brahma-lokaṃ gatvā tad-bhogānte paramāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:449: samādhi-lābhaḥ ity uktvā īśvara-praṇidhānād vā (1.23) ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:450: praṇidhānaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ (1.27)
GE07bhg4c08u:453: iha tu sākṣād eva tataḥ parama-gati-lābha ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:454: tasmād avirodhayom ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmarann ātmano yoga-dhāraṇām āsthita iti vyākhyeyam /
GE07bhg4c08u:456_0: viśvanāthaḥ --- uktam arthaṃ vadan yoge prakāram āha sarvāṇi cakṣur-ādīndriya-dvārāṇi
GE07bhg4c08u:456_1: saṃyamya bāhya-viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya manaś ca hṛdy eva nirudhya viṣayāntareṣv asaṅkalpya
GE07bhg4c08u:456_2: mūrdhni bhruvor madhye eva prāṇam ādhāya yoga-dhāraṇām ānakha-śikha-man-mūrti-bhāvanām
GE07bhg4c08u:456_3: āśritaḥ san om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma-svarūpaṃ vyāharan uccārayan tad-vācyaṃ mām anusmarann
GE07bhg4c08u:458_0: sarvāṇi bahir jñāna-dvārāṇi śrotrādīni saṃyamya śabdādibhyo viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya
GE07bhg4c08u:458_1: doṣa-darśanābhyāsena tad-vimukhais tais tān gṛhṇan śrotrādi-saṃyame 'pi manaḥ pracared
GE07bhg4c08u:458_2: ity ata āha hṛdi sthite mayi antar-jñāna-dvāraṃ mano nirudhya niveśya manasāpi tān smaran /
GE07bhg4c08u:459_0: atha kriyā-dvāraṃ prāṇaṃ ca mūrdhnādhāyādau hṛt-padme vaśīkṛtya tasmād ūrdhva-gatayā
GE07bhg4c08u:459_1: suṣumṇayā gurūpadiṣṭa-vartmanā bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa bhruvor madhye tad-upari brahma-randhre
GE07bhg4c08u:459_2: ca saṃsthāpya ātmano mama yoga-dhāraṇām āāda-śikhaṃ mad-bhāvanam āsthitaḥ kurvan /
GE07bhg4c08u:460_0: om iti vācakaṃ brahma tatra vyāharan antar uccārayan tat stauti ekākṣaram iti ekaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:460_1: pradhānaṃ ca tad-akṣaram avināśi ceti tathā tad vācyaṃ māṃ parmātmānam anusmaran
GE07bhg4c08u:460_2: dhyāyan yo dehaṃ tyajan prayāti sa paramāṃ gatiṃ mat-sālokyatāṃ yāti //12-13 //
GE07bhg4c08u:463: ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:465: śrīdharaḥ - evaṃ cānta-kāle dhāraṇayā mat-prāptir nityābhyāsavata eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c08u:469: yo māṃ satataṃ nirantaraṃ nityaśaḥ pratidinaṃ smarati /
GE07bhg4c08u:470: tasya nitya-yuktasya samāhitasyāhaṃ sukhena labhyo 'smi nānyasya //14//
GE07bhg4c08u:471_0: madhusūdanaḥ - ya evaṃ vāyu-nirodha-vaidhuryeṇa prāṇam āveśya mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā dehaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:471_1: tyaktuṃ svecchayā na śaknoti kiṃ tu karma-kṣayeṇaiva paravaśo dehaṃ tyajati tasya
GE07bhg4c08u:471_2: kiṃ syād iti tad āha ananya-cetā iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:472_0: na vidyate mad-anya-viṣaye ceto yasya so 'nanya-cetāḥ satataṃ nirantaraṃ nityaśo
GE07bhg4c08u:472_1: yāvaj-jīvaṃ yo māṃ smarati tasya sva-vaśatayā vā dehaṃ tyajato 'pi nitya-yuktasya
GE07bhg4c08u:472_2: satata-samāhita-cittasya yoginaḥ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyo 'haṃ parameśvara itareṣām
GE07bhg4c08u:472_3: atidurlabho 'pi he pārtha tavāham atisulabho mā bhaiṣīr ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:476: satatam iti nairantaryaṃ nityaśa iti dīrgha-kālatvaṃ smaraṇasyoktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:479: tatra sa ity abhyāsa ukto 'pi smaraṇa-paryavasāyī /
GE07bhg4c08u:480: tena yāvaj-jīvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikṣepāntara-śūnyatayā bhagavad-anucintanam eva parama-gati-hetur mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā tu svecchayā prāṇotkramaṇaṃ bhavatu na veti nātīvāgrahaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c08u:481: viśvanāthaḥ --- tad evam ārtaḥ ity ādinā karma-miśrām,
GE07bhg4c08u:483: kaviṃ purāṇaṃ ity ādibhir yoga-miśrāṃ ca saparikarāṃ pradhānībhūtāṃ bhaktim uktvā sarva-śreṣṭhāṃ nirguṇāṃ kevalāṃ bhaktim āha-ananya-cetā iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:486: tathā svargāpargādāv api prāpyatvena ceto yasya /
GE07bhg4c08u:487: satataṃ sadeti kāla-deśa-pātra-śuddhy-ādy-anapekṣatayaiva nityaśaḥ pratidinam eva yo māṃ smarati,
GE07bhg4c08u:488: yasya tena bhaktenāhaṃ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:490: nitya-yuktasya nitya-mad-yogākāṅkṣiṇa āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac ceti bhāviny api yoga āśāṃsite kta-pratyayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:494: baladevaḥ - evaṃ mokṣa-mātra-kāṅkṣiṇāṃ yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim upadiśya sva-jñānināṃ svam evākāṅkṣatām eka-bhaktir ity uktāṃ śuddhāṃ bhaktiṃ upadiśati ananyeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:495_0: yo jano 'nanya-cetā na matto 'nyasmin karma-yogādike sādhane svarga-mokṣādike sādhye
GE07bhg4c08u:495_1: vā ceto yasya sa mad-ekābhilāṣavān satataṃ sarvadā deśa-kālādi-viśuddhi-nairapekṣeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:495_2: nityaśaḥ pratyahaṃ māṃ yaśodā-stanandhayaṃ nṛsiṃha-raghunāthādi-rūpeṇa bahudhāvirbhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:495_3: sarveśvaram atimātra-priyaṃ smaraty arcana-japādiṣv anusandhatte tasyāhaṃ tat-prītijñaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:497: na lokāvyaya ity ādinā kartari tasyāḥ pratiṣedhāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:498: tādṛśasya tasya viyogam asahiṣṇur aham eva tam ātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:500: śrutiś caivam āha - yam evaiṣa vṛnute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā viviṛṇute tanūṃ svām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:501: svayaṃ ca vakṣyati - dadāmi buddhi-yogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c08u:503: sarvadā mad-yogaṃ vāñchataḥ āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac ca iti sūtrād āśāṃsite yoge bhaviṣyaty api kta-pratyayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:507: mām upetya punar janma duḥkhālayam aśāśvatam /
GE07bhg4c08u:509: śrīdharaḥ - yady evaṃ tvaṃ sulabho 'si tataḥ kiṃ ?
GE07bhg4c08u:511: ukta-lakṣaṇā mahātmāno mad-bhaktā māṃ prāpya punar duḥkhāśrayam antiyaṃ ca janma na prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:512: yatas te paramāṃ samyak siddhiṃ mokṣam eva prāptāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:513: punar janmano duḥkhānāṃ cālayaṃ sthānaṃ te mām upetya na prāpnuvantīti vā //15//
GE07bhg4c08u:514: madhusūdanaḥ - bhagavantaṃ prāptāḥ punar āvartante na veti sandehe nāvartanta ity āha mām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:515: mām īśvaraṃ prāpya punar janma manuṣyādi-deha-sambandhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ duḥkhālayaṃ garbha-vāsa-yoni-dvāra-nirgamanādy-aneka-duḥkha-sthānam /
GE07bhg4c08u:516: aśāśvatam asthiraṃ dṛṣṭa-naṣṭa-prāyaṃ nāpnuvanti punar nāvartanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:517: yato mahātmnāno rajas-tamo-mala-rahitāntaḥ-karaṇā śuddha-sattvāḥ samutpanna-samyag-darśanā mal-loka-bhogānte paramāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ muktiṃ gatās te /
GE07bhg4c08u:518: atra māṃ prāpya siddhiṃ gatā iti vadatopāsakānāṃ krama-muktir darśitā //15//
GE07bhg4c08u:519: viśvanāthaḥ --- tvāṃ prāptavatas tasya kiṃ syād ity āha mām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:521: aśāśvatam anityaṃ ca janma nāpnuvanti kintu sukha-pūrṇaṃ janma maj-janma-tulyaṃ prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:522: śāśvatas tu dhruvo nityaḥ sadānanaḥ sanātanaḥ ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:523: yadā vasudeva-gṛhe sukha-pūrṇaṃ nitya-bhūtam aprākṛtaṃ maj-janma bhavet tad eva teṣāṃ mad-bhaktānām api man-nitya-saṅgināṃ janma syān nānyadā iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:524: paramām iti anye bhaktāḥ saṃsiddhiṃ prāpnuvanti ananya-cetasas tu paramāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ mal-līlā-parikaratām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:526: baladevaḥ -- tāṃ labdhavataḥ kiṃ phalaṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha mām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:527: mām ukta-lakṣaṇam upetya prāpya punaḥ prapañce janma nāpnuvanti nāvartanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:529: aśāśvatam anityaṃ dṛṣṭa-naṣṭa-prāyam śāśvatas tu dhruvo nityaḥ ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:530: yatas te paramāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ gatiṃ mām eva gatā labdhavantaḥ avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim iti vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c08u:531_1: bhaktāyatta-sarvasvaṃ māṃ vinānyat sārṣṭyādikam agaṇayanto made-eka-jīvātavo bhavanty
GE07bhg4c08u:531_2: atas te mām eva saṃsiddhiṃ gatāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:537: mām upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma na vidyate //16//
GE07bhg4c08u:538: śrīdharaḥ - sarva eva jīvā mahā-sukṛtino 'pi jāyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:539: mad-bhaktās tu tadvan na jāyanta ity āha ā-brahmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:541: madhusūdanaḥ - bhagavantam upāgatānāṃ samyag-darśinām apunar-āvṛttau kathitāyāṃ tato vimukhānām asamyag-darśināṃ punar-āvṛttir artha-siddhety āha ābrahmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:542: ābrahma-bhuvanāt bhavanty atra bhūtānīti bhuvanaṃ lokaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:544: brahma-lokena saha sarve 'pi lokā mad-vimukhānām asamyag-darśināṃ bhoga-bhūtayaḥ punar-āvartinaḥ punar-āvartana-śīlāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:545: brahma-bhavanād iti pāṭhe bhavanaṃ vāsa-sthānam iti sa evārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:547: kiṃ tadvad eva tvāṃ prāptānām api punar āvṛttir nety āha mām īśvaram ekam upetya tu /
GE07bhg4c08u:549: mām eva prāpya nirvṛttānāṃ he kaunteya mātṛto 'pi prasiddha-mahānubhāva punar-janma na vidyate punar-āvṛttir nāstīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:550: atrārjuna kaunteyeti sambodhana-dvayena svarūpataḥ kāraṇataś ca śuddhir jñāna-saṃpattaye sūcitā /
GE07bhg4c08u:552: ye krama-mukti-phalābhirupāsanābhir brahma-lokaṃ prāptās teṣām eva tatrotpanna-samyag-darśanānāṃ brahmaṇā saha mokṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:553: ye tu pañcāgni-vidyādibhir atat-kratavo 'pi tatra gatās teṣām avaśyambhāvi punar-janma /
GE07bhg4c08u:554: ataeva krama-mukty-abhiprāyeṇa brahma-lokam abhisampadyate na ca punar āvartate,
GE07bhg4c08u:556: itaratra teṣām iha na punar āvṛttiḥ imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante itīhemam iti ca viśeṣaṇād gamanādhikaraṇa-kalpād anyatra punar āvṛttiḥ pratīyate //16//
GE07bhg4c08u:557: viśvanāthaḥ --- sarva eva jīvā mahā-sukṛtino 'pi jāyante mad-bhaktās tu tavan na jāyanta ity āha ābrahmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:559: baladevaḥ - mad-vimukhās tu karma-viśeṣaiḥ svargādi-lokān prāptā api tebhyaḥ patantīty āha ābrahmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:561: brahma-lokena saha sarve svargādayo lokās tat-tad-vartino jīvās tat-tat-karma-kṣaye sati punar āvartino bhūmau punar janma labhante /
GE07bhg4c08u:563: atredaṃ bodhyaṃ pañcāgni-vidyayā mahāhava-maraṇādinā ye brahma-lokaṃ gatās teṣāṃ bhogānte pātaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:564: ye tu sa-niṣṭhāḥ pareśa-bhaktāḥ svargādi-lokān krameṇānubhavantas tatra gatās teṣāṃ tu na tasmāt pātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:565: kintu tal-loka-vināśe tat-patinā saha pareśa-loka-prāptir eva -
GE07bhg4c08u:566: brahmaṇā saha te sarve samprāpte pratisañcare /
GE07bhg4c08u:573: śrīdharaḥ - nanu ca tapasvino dāna-śīlā vīta-rāgās titikṣavaḥ /

GE07bhg4c08u:669: tasmāc carācara-kāraṇa-bhūtād avyaktāt paras tasyāpi kāraṇa-bhūto yo 'nyas tad-vilakṣaṇo 'vyaktaś cakṣur-ādy-agocaro bhāvaḥ sanātano 'nādiḥ /

GE07bhg4c08u:679: viśvanāthaḥ --- tasmād ukta-lakṣaṇād avyaktāt prajāpater hiraṇyagarbhāt sakāśāt paraḥ śreṣṭaḥ /

GE07bhg4c08u:707: mama dhāmeti rāhoḥ śira itivad bheda-kalpanayā ṣaṣṭhī /
GE07bhg4c08u:708: ato 'ham eva paramā gatir ity arthaḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c08u:709: viśvanāthaḥ --- pūrvokta-ślokoktam avyakta-śabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe avyakta iti /

GE07bhg4c08u:768: tathāpi pitṛ-yāne pathi gatā āvartanta eva na ke 'pi tatra krama-mukti-bhājaḥ /

GE07bhg4c08u:769_1: gatā hiraṇyagarbha-paryantam amānava-puruṣa-nītā api pañcāgni-vidyādy-upāsakā atat-kratavo
GE07bhg4c08u:769_2: bhogānte nivartanta eva tathāpi daharādy-upāsakāḥ krameṇa mucyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:773: atipraśasta iti stutir upapadyate keṣāṃcid āvṛttāv apy anāvṛtti-phalatvasyānapāyāt /

GE07bhg4c08u:776_1: ceti tad-anurodhenaikasmin kāla-pada eva lakṣaṇāśritā kālābhimāni-devatānāṃ mārga-dvaye 'pi bāhulyāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:777: agni-dhūmayos tad-itarayoḥ sator api agnihotra-śabdavad eka-deśenāpy upalakṣaṇaṃ kāla-śabdena /

GE07bhg4c08u:779: ity anena tasya nāma-dheyatayā na syāt /

GE07bhg4c08u:782: na tatra tva-prāntau kaścin mārga-niyama ity uktaḥ /

GE07bhg4c08u:808: agnir-jyotir ity arcir abhimāninī devatā lakṣyate /

GE07bhg4c08u:809_1: iti uttarāyaṇa-rūpa-ṣaṇmāsābhimāninī devataiva lakṣyate ātivāhikās tal-liṅgāt (MD 4.3.4) iti nyāyāt /

GE07bhg4c08u:911_1: dhyāna-niṣṭho na muhyati kevalaṃ karma dhūmādi-mārga-prāpakaṃ kartavyatvena na pratyeti
GE07bhg4c08u:912: tasmād yogasthāpunar-āvṛtti-phalatvāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yoga-yuktaḥ samāhita-citto bhavāpunar-āvṛttaye he 'rjuna //27//

GE07bhg4c08u:915: baladevaḥ -- etayoḥ pathor bodho viveka-hetur bhavatīti taṃ stauti naita iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:916: sṛtī panthāno jānan arcir-ādi-mokṣāya dhūmādiḥ saṃsārāyeti smaran kaścid api yogī mad-bhakto na muhyati dhūmādi-prāpakaṃ karma kartavyatvena na niścinotīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:924: śrīdharaḥ - adhyāyārtham aṣṭa-praśnārtha-nirṇayaṃ saphalam upasaṃharati vedeṣv iti /

GE07bhg4c08u:932: tataś ca yogī jñānī bhūtvā param utkṛṣṭam ādyaṃ jagan mūla-bhūtaṃ sthānaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ prāpnoti //28//
GE07bhg4c08u:937: madhusūdanaḥ - punaḥ śraddhānu-vṛddhy-arthaṃ yogaṃ stauti vedeṣv iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:941: dāneṣu tulā-puruṣādiṣu deśe kāle pātre ca śraddhayā samyag-dattesu yat-puṇya-phalaṃ puṇyasya dharmasya phalaṃ svarga-svārājyādi pradiṣṭaṃ śāstreṇa /

GE07bhg4c08u:955: dāneṣu deśa-kāla-pātra-parīkṣayā śraddhayā ca samyag-datteṣu yat puṇya-phalaṃ svarga-rājyādi-lakṣaṇaṃ pradiṣṭam uktam /
